Class XMLConfigurator

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.zti.incubator.configurator.XMLConfigurator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurator

    public class XMLConfigurator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Configurator
    This is real implementation of Configurator interface based on XML parsing from existing file
    Since:
    ZTIU 1.1.0
